meanings.definition: Outbid someone on a property purchase.
meanings.sent1: She gazumps the other buyers by offering more money for the house.
meanings.sent2: In the auction, he gazumps his competitors with a higher bid.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky buyer gazumps the rest by quickly raising the price.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to gazumps everyone else shows in her bidding strategy.
meanings.sent5: The real estate agent gazumps the clients with unexpected offers.

meanings.definition: To surpass or outdo someone in a competitive situation.
meanings.sent1: The young athlete gazumps the older competitors in the race.
meanings.sent2: He always gazumps his colleagues with innovative ideas at work.
meanings.sent3: The student gazumps his friends in the quiz with his knowledge.
meanings.sent4: Her talent gazumps the others, making her the star of the show.
meanings.sent5: The team gazumps the opponents with their exceptional teamwork.
